Functions
Borrow_Return_Film
void Borrow_Return_Film(
char Borrow_Return,
Member_infos *ADHERANT_INFOS,
Borrowing_Infos *LOAN,
Film_Infos *FILM,
char *Borrower
)

It's the core function for the borrow/return operation and it's used on Double mode especially to interact with the Film , Personal Borrowed films , Global Borrowers and Global Borrowed films Databases:

It proceeds in 4 steps :

1

It updates the number of actual remaining copies in the original FILM Database

2

It creates a custom file associated with the user and keep track of his/her personal borrowings

3

It keeps track of the Borrowers

4

It keeps track of all the borrowed films and the number of copies borrowed

Parameters
Borrow_Return
char

It denotes The mode which will the function be used in i.e: "B" for borrow /"R" for return

ADHERANT_INFOS
Member_infos*

The member info structure used to inform us on the member category.

LOAN
Borrowing_Infos*

The Loan structure to hold the Borrowing infos i.e: Date ,Code ...

FILM
Film_Infos*

The Film structure which will be holding the film infos

Borrower
char*

The name of the borrower which is necessary to generate his/her personal file.

See Also

Update_Borrowing_Infos / Customize_File / Borrowers_Record / FILM_Record

Checking_Max_Borrows
int Checking_Max_Borrows(
char *Borrower,
char *Member_category
)

It checks if the max borrowed films for a specific member is attained by counting the number of films in the Personal Borrowed films database which basically the number of lines

Returns
if the Max borrowed films is reached

Returns 1

if not

Returns 0
